ygData.subject: Re: "guild""servers"
ygData.msgSnippet: Answers below questions. ... From: LKW  Even though I got 3 over million worth of GPs in bank (coz of house deeds), if I kena looted,
ygData.messageBody:
Answers below questions.
----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
Even though I got 3 over million worth of GPs in bank (coz
of house deeds), if I kena looted, also very sian to restart everything and
go around buying/making the stuffs again...
>> Hahaha! Me too!

Ah, so no house to store stuffs.
>>Only guilds can have houses but even that, houses are so expensive, you
won't have money to buy things to store in it ;-) Also, UO houses beat EQ's
100-1.

Can misc items (like potions) be stacked?
>>Yes, small ones and "special" ones.

I presumed it will then required 1-2 mules to act like storage house? ;)
Or there are much lesser stuffs in EQ that i dun need much storage space?
>>For me, I have hardly any need for a bank ;-)

Anyway it's just a supplement to this mailing list, not a
replacement ;)
>>Darn, I love this phrase. Its going into my "phrase" storage bain.

Wilson
